import React, {Component} from 'react' class WantToRead extends Component{ updateShelf =(book,shelf)=>{ } render(){ const {books} = this.props const wantToRead= books.filter((book)=>(book.shelf.toLowerCase()==="wanttoread")) return(

Want to Read

    {wantToRead.map((book)=>(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } } export default WantToRead
